name: taxis-24
description: They would like to disrupt the taxi industry in Rwanda by providing a white-label solution to the

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register --timeout 3000 ./src/tests --exit
scripts.coverage: npm run test  && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.migrate: NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db-seed-test: NODE_ENV=testing npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && NODE_ENV=testing sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db-seed-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all

author: Benit Havugimana
